phrases: I had lost my way during my journey.
Only my soul was wandering, while I stood still.
But right now, I am walking to a distant place.
That is right, ever since I met you on this road.
The travellers witnessed the song, the forbidden song,
And I became attached to it as I heard it alone with you.
If the world I saw in my dreams exists somewhere,
Let us go search for it, beyond the winds.
Whether it is a freezing dawn,
A dry midday,
A shivering night,
or the ends of the Earth, let us go and see it.
Enough already!
Even a little is okay.
Thank you.
Wolf and the Great Plan
You sure came back early.
Horo...
I am sorry.
I was able to collect three Rumione.
There is forty-four Rumione left, but...
I cannot do anything about it.
All I could think of was to take that money and go to a gambling den.
But I am sure you have more talent for gambling than I do.
If it is not going to end well at this rate, then the person who uses it will be the winner.
It is not like anything will change, even if I gathered the three Rumione towards my debt.
Fool!
Hurry up and come back!
So, what are you going to do?
Sorry, I dropped this from the window.
Give me a break.
Damn fool.
Sorry.
What do you mean, Sorry?
What are you sorry about?
What would you do if I took that money and ran away?
I would have been fine with that.
Because of my mistake, I cannot carry out the contract we made.
So, at the least, it should be enough for traveling expenses.
You are...
You are leaving me traveling expenses, you say?
Y-Yeah.
I am the one at fault, are not I?
If I were not with you, you could have borrowed money!
Why are not you angry because of that?
Why do not you blame me?
You came with me because you were worried.
I cannot possibly do-
You damn fool!
You...!
Watch out!
You damn softy!
Softy?
Are not you?
I was selfish and followed you.
But that did not work out, so you should be angry!
But you just brush away my hand and immediately apologize.
That is how I am.
I did something I cannot take back.
Something that I cannot apologize enough for.
That is why I wanted to do what I could.
But if that backfired, I am sorry.
Hey.
Tell me one thing.
W-Why are you such a...
S-Softy?
It is my personality...
I guess?
Y-You fool!
Your personality?
Your personality, you say?!
Is not it a male's ability to know when to lie and charm?!
You damn fool!
S-Sorry!
The truth is...
There are times where someone wants you to lie,
and times when you say it, they just want to jump onto your face and pulverize it.
What time do you think it is now?
The...
The latter.
I just cannot believe it anymore.
You are an unbelievable softy.
Do not you think it would be unfair to charm me in this situation?
I am shocked, if I say so myself.
Even so, I wanted you to say it.
That is why, once more!
Why...
Are you such a softy?
Because you are special.
Geez, what the heck are we doing?
You are the one that made me do it!
Well, it was a good rehearsal for you, right?
But, you know...
Could you let me be angry next time?
I am happy that you care for me and all,
but there are times when problems are solved more quickly
when we yell and get angry at each other.
I got it.
So, exactly how much money is in that leather pouch?
Three and two-sevenths Rumione.
So, there is forty-three and five-sevenths left of your debt.
I have a good plan.
What kind?!
It would be troublesome if you expected too much out of it.
Are you serious?
Yes.
Normally, we would be captured right away.
But there is one thing that can be made possible.
R-Really?
I am with you.
Yeah.
Do you have something important to say?
I have to take that road this time?
It is a bit out of place, but it should be fine if it is you.
With God's protection, have not you been able to pass through them all?
Yes.
But I have heard that mercenaries have been appearing in that area recently.
God will surely protect you.
There is nothing to be concerned about.
Yes...
You really are a wonderful shepherd.
We are very proud of you, too.
Smuggle?
Do not tell me...
It is just what you are thinking.
You are being a fool, leave now.
There have been people in the past who have tried to smuggle using the same method.
They were all captured.
If you know, then there is nothing left to say.
People on the verge of bankruptcy often mistake reckless plans for perfect ones.
And that is what you are doing right now.
But what if there were a resourceful person we could fully trust to smuggle gold?
If there is someone so resourceful, they would not need to smuggle gold, they are already making enough profit.
That is just an empty theory.
What if the person is resourceful, but not making any profit at all?
Not possible.
What kind of person would fall under that category?
Skilled, can be found in this city,
has a small salary, and also needs money.
This person is not satisfied with their employer,
and has an indistinct bitterness towards them.
Their employer is the church.
Smuggling gold would be an act of defiance against them.
Not only would they gain money,
but if we tempt them with being able to take revenge on the church,
I am sure they would come biting for the chance.
Plus, the chance of them betraying us is nearly zero.
If I were to tell you the name of this person, I am sure you would understand.
Then why do not you two just smuggle gold yourselves?
It is just odd to come to us, since your share of the profits would be lower.
Today is the last day to pay my debt.
Once the sun sets, I will be captured by the Trading Guild.
Also, this is all the money I have.
I want you to take this as insurance and believe in me.
And...
To suspend the debt collection,
and to collects funds to invest in the smuggling of gold.
Do...
Do you have time to be hesitating?
What did you say?
Hey.
It seems another one just left now.
My ears are especially good.
I can clearly hear whisperings.
They are making plans downstairs so that they can run away.
Oh, another one left.
At this rate, if the company continues to do nothing...
Stop!
Mister Remerio, how about it?
I am sure you know the routes to sell smuggled gold.
The conditions are not bad, so will not you join us in smuggling gold?
Mister Remerio!
Very well.
Let us do it.
May God watch over us.
Call in Liebert.
Yes.
Now then, it is my turn next.
What do you mean?
Do not tell me, is a good-natured person like you going to trick that girl?
There are good-natured and pure people in this world.
You are pretty arrogant for someone who does not know a thing about females.
Did not you corner Remerio during our negotiation earlier?
I will talk to her myself.
After all, it was me that got lost in greed and got a hold of those goods in decline.
I cannot have you talking for me just because I feel depressed.
What?
I thought I would have you owe me one,
and have you pay me back later.
Oh, that was close.
Hello!
Lawrence and...
Horo?
Meeting by chance in front of the church is no doubt the work of God!
You cannot trick anyone with that, even me.
There have been people recently who have been drinking the consecrated wine at the church.
I do not drink beer and I rarely ever touch wine.
So, um...
Yes, I actually came to request a job.
Really?!
Really?
Well, let us not stand around here and go to a stall.
Yes.
To our reunion!
So, you said you could go to Ramtra, right?
Yes, I can.
Even while herding sheep?
If there is not too many.
I want to request a particularly strange job this time.
Your pay will be twenty Rumione.
Of course, it will not be just a cheap document,
it will be in cash.
Sorry.
T-Twenty?
Twenty?
But there is danger, so that is your pay if you succeed.
If you fail, you will not get paid.
Okay.
Your job would be to herd the sheep.
And, if possible, to bring them back safely.
We will not need any other skills except your skills as a shepherd.
It must be a very dangerous job.
Twenty Rumione is...
I will not deny it.
That is why I will not forcefully request it from you.
I do not mind if you think it over.
The cost to join the union, at the very most, is one Rumione, right?
With twenty Rumione, you will not have to rent a house and you can work without worrying about living costs.
Eventually, you will be able to easily buy a license.
If that happens, you will be the female owner of Nora Tailors.
Do you intend to join this city's tailoring and accessories union, Nora?
No, I was thinking of joining in a different city.
Is that so?
The size of this city is charming, though, is not it?
It is hard to live in a city without your friends.
But, well, you do not want to be involved with the church anymore, right?
T-That is not...
You work diligently, and you protect the sheep the church entrusts you, but no matter how hard you persist,
they continue to doubt whether you are using pagan magic or not.
Am I right?
And they are trying to reveal your true character
by making you go to places where no other shepherd would dare go,
while saying other shepherds have already taken the other lands.
I am sure the priests will keep sending you off to dangerous lands until wolves or mercenaries attack you.
And they will keep sending you off every day until they have proof that you are a pagan.
I was also in a very similar situation.
Let me say it clearly.
The church here is lower than pigs!
And this is what we came up with.
We will because some trouble for the church, earn money, and go to a different city.
What do you think?
What are you going to do?
Smuggle gold.
No way...
But what can I possibly do?
To pass through this city's strict gates,
we will hide gold within the stomachs of the sheep.
Can I hear you out till the end?
In cities influenced by the church, all gold has an absurdly high price.
And so, the best supplier is the pagan city, Ramtra.
However, by taking the safe road from Ramtra, there are too many people on it.
Additionally, that road is also the turf of many other shepherds.
So, I am able to take a road that is sparsely populated,
which will also serve to keep suspicions about what I am doing low.
Plus, the road I take is the shortest distance between Ramtra and this city.
Exactly.
In addition, you have been treated terribly by the church in this city.
Therefore, this plan is also the perfect chance to show your resentment.
The church's greatest source of funds come from donations and the export and import of gold.
However, if we are found, a terrible punishment will await us.
And so, for your safety once the job finishes, you will need to leave the city.
And that is why...
The pay is twenty Rumione.
Please let me do it.
Thank you.
Thank you.
Um...
What is it?
If it were a job from other people, I would not accept.
I accepted because... it was you, Lawrence.
How about you act more happy?
It is going well, after all.
No matter the profit,
there is no gamble worth putting one's life on the line.
Of course.
Plus, that speech emphasizing the profit was the same as swindling her.
It is common sense among merchants that the one to accept an unfavorable contract is the stupid one.
And look at the person we made a contract with.
She is a shepherd who does not know her right from her left.
Well, it is true that her smile did seem pure.
Geez...
You are a helpless softy.
That shepherd girl is not a prey that is meant to be chased and eaten.
She is a bold shepherd that jumped into a nest of wild beasts herself.
Perhaps she is wearing sheep's clothes, and might be another animal.
I do not really want to say it, but...
She is a shepherd that even I recognize.
You are not that bad.
Keep being a softy to a limit.
Well, anyway, it will end in a way where all of us can laugh.
We have no choice but to work hard.
Really?
I believe chuckling with just us two alone is more charming.
It certainly is charming, but...
I would feel more relieved to laugh with everyone.
You are such a softy.
Is that bad?
Not at all.
Boss...
Are we really going it do it?
We have to do it.
We have got no choice.
We have to do it, Liebert!
Seven apples on the witch's tree
With seven seeds to plant inside of me
In spring time I grew a magic song
Then skipping along,
I sang the song to everyone
I look at the world through apple eyes
And cut myself a slice of sunshine pie
I danced with the peanuts for the flies
Till someone had told me
To say hello for every good-bye
Saw some sugar stars
I will put them in a jar
And we will wish around the world
Oh we will wish around the world
I am a little wolf inside a cart
You say,
And off I go from June to May
Oh we will wish around the world
Let us wish around the world
Next, Wolf and Young Pack
Next, Wolf and Young Pack
